question: Deskipsi kupu-kupu tentang Physical Appearance and Characteristics . Tolong dijawab Teman

answers.answer: the animal it has wings, colourfull, beutiful. the animals is small,

Butterflies have beauty wings. They are the one of Lepidoptera insects. They can fly. They have three pairs of legs. Their bodies are divided into three parts: the head, thorax, and abdomen. Butterflies have a large eye on both sides of their head and two pairs of wings on the middle part of the body. They grow in rows. They have a good sense of taste, especially for sweet things (that's why that they like to perch the flowers). The butterfly's life circle consist of four parts, they are egg, larva, pupa, and adult. :)
Mostly of children like butterflies, 'cause they have a beauty color. :D

Tolong di jawab ya.. Makasi..

answers.answer:
Regular Verb ( kata kerja beraturan )
abase, bake, closed, die, escape, face, improve, invite, like, note

Irregular Verb ( kata kerja tak beraturan )
abide, bring, buy, cut, draw, lose, may, put, read, quit

related_questions.question:

2. Lion
3. Tiger
5. Cow
6. Goat
7. Cat
8. Pinguin
9. Chicken
10. Dog

answers.answer:
Elephant : has a great body, has a proboscis, has ivory, gray colored, big legs and oval
Lion : brown, have fangs, claws, have thick hair on approximately heads, have 4 legs
Tiger : There Orain colored striped stripes on the body, have fangs, claws, have long collapsed, has 4 legs
Cat : berwarna coklat, abu abu, hitam, putih, memiliki taring, memiliki cakar, memiliki tubuh kecil panjang sepeti cita, memiliki 4 kaki, memiliki rambut di sekitar tubuh
Chicken : has feathers, has beak, has 2 legs, have wings, has a comb

Nama lain dari Verb 1, verb 2, verb 3, dan verb-ing Please....Need banget>_<

answers.answer:
v1 = bare infinitive
v2 = past tense
v3 = past participle
ving = present participle

related_questions.question: Apakah Rumus Lengkap Past Perfect Tense?

answers.answer:
Rumus Past Perfect Tense
Positif: S + had + V3
Negatif: S + had + not + V3
Tanya: Had + S + V3

(+) S + had + Verb-3/past participle
(-) S + had + not + Verb-3/past participle
(?) had + S + Verb-3/past participle

related_questions.question:
Apa perbedaan kalimat aktif dan kalimat pasif?
 tolong kasih tau contohnya juga....

answers.answer:
1 . Kalimat Aktif Kalimat aktif adalah kalimat yang subjeknya melakukan suatu pekerjaan. Biasanya memiliki predikatnya berupa kata kerja berawalan me atau ber. Contoh: Nina menulis surat untuk nenek.
 

2 .Kalimat Pasif Kalimat pasif adalah kalimat yang subjeknya dikenai pekerjaan. Biasanya memiliki predikat berupa kata kerja berawalan di-. Contoh: Surat untuk nenek ditulis oleh Nina. Cara mengubah kalimat aktif menjadi kalimat pasif: 1. Subjek pada kalimat aktif dijadikan objek pada kalimat pasif. 2. Awalan me- diganti dengan di-. 3. Tambahkan kata oleh di belakang predikat. Contoh: Bapak memancing ikan. (aktif) Ikan dipancing oleh bapak. (pasif) 4. Jika subjek kalimat aktif berupa kata ganti maka awalan me- pada predikat dihapus, kemudian subjek dan predikat dirapatkan. Contoh: Aku harus memngerjakan PR. (aktif) PR harus kukerjakan. (pasif)
